full_summary:
# Enterprise Resource Planning Functional Analysts - Request for Proposal
### Requesting Agency and Contact Information

* Agency: Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat
* Address: 90 Elgin Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R5, Canada
* Contact: Dawn Dormer, (343) 542-8102, [Dawn.Dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca](mailto:Dawn.Dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca)
### Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: 24062-24-021
* Reference Number: CB-7861-30885028
* Tender Status: Expired
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Selective Tendering
* Expected Contract Dates:
	+ Start Date: 2023-09-01
	+ End Date: 2028-08-31
### Trade Agreements

The tender is open to contractors who are part of the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
### Deliverables

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat requires Enterprise Resource Planning Functional Analysts on an ‘as and when requested’ basis to support the maintenance, development, and implementation of various initiatives such as Central Agency Cluster – Shared Systems, Hydrae, and the technical component of the Financial Management Transformation.
### Tender Documents

You can access the RFP document by visiting the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7861/24062-24-021-npp-eng.pdf (English) or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7861/24062-24-021-npp-fr.pdf (French)

The requested RFP document is uploaded in the provided link, formatting has been corrected for clarity, the objective of the request is stated in two languages (English and French). Additionally, having identified that the provided RFP already included both the English and French versions-PDF the entry now presents essential tender information  for those interested in participating in the project
